name: UIImage.RenderingMode
desc: Constants that specify the possible rendering modes for an image.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: Draw the image using the contextâ€™s default rendering mode.

items.name: case alwaysOriginal
items.desc: Always draw the original image, without treating it as a template.

items.name: case alwaysTemplate
items.desc: Always draw the image as a template image, ignoring its color information.
